tagline: Your premier destination for comfortable stays and professional event spaces.
powerfulManagement: Powerful admin panel for easy management.
fillFormToBookDormitory: Fill out the form below to book your selected dormitory.
selectBothStartAndEndDates: Please select both start and end dates for your booking.
enterEmployer: Enter your employer or organization name
dormitoryBookingPendingApproval: Your dormitory booking request has been received. Please find payment details above or on the next page. After payment, confirm by sending a screenshot to @oroedubot on Telegram. Your booking will be finalized after admin approval and payment verification.
facilityBookingPendingApproval: Your facility booking request has been received and is currently pending approval. We will notify you soon.
loginAsCompanyToBook: Please log in as a company representative to book halls or sections.
pleaseSelectSectionsToBook: Please select one or more sections to book.
fillFormToBookFacility: Fill out the form below to book the selected hall or section.
anySpecialRequests: Any special requests or additional information
incompleteBookingConfirmationDetails: Incomplete booking confirmation details. Please try again or contact support.
thankYouFacilityBookingWillBeReviewed: Thank you for your booking request. We will review it and get back to you soon regarding approval and payment.
errorFetchingDormitoryDetails: Error fetching dormitory details. Please try again.
itemNotFound: The requested item was not found.
viewAndManageDormitories: View and manage all registered dormitories.
confirmDeleteDormitory: Are you sure you want to delete this dormitory? This action cannot be undone.

noBookingsFoundAdminCta: No bookings have been made yet.
noBookingsMatchFilters: No bookings match your current filter criteria.
companyRegistrationDescription: Register your company to access facility booking services.
registrationSubmittedMessage: Your company registration has been submitted and is pending approval by the admin. You will be notified.
emailAlreadyInUseError: This email is already in use. Please try a different email or login.
unknownError: An unknown error occurred. Please try again.
enterCredentialsToAccessAccount: Enter your credentials to access your account.
invalidCredentials: Invalid email or password. Please try again.
logoutSuccessfulMessage: You have been successfully logged out.
logoutFailedMessage: There was an issue logging you out. Please try again.
searchCompanies: Search by company name, contact, or email...
viewAndApproveCompanies: View and approve or reject new company registrations.
companyStatusUpdated: Company (ID: {companyId}) status has been updated to {status}.
adminOrSuperAdminOnlyPage: This page is accessible only to Administrators or Super Administrators.
noCompaniesMatchSearch: No companies match your search criteria.
superAdminOnlyPage: This page is accessible only to Super Administrators.
registerAdminDescription: Fill in the details to create a new admin account.
adminRegisteredMessage: Administrator account for {email} has been successfully created.
weakPasswordError: Password is too weak. It should be at least 6 characters.
invalidEmailFormat: The email address is badly formatted.
noBookingsMatchSearch: No bookings match your search criteria.
confirmDeleteDormitoryMessage: Are you sure you want to delete this dormitory? All associated data will be permanently removed. This action cannot be undone.
noDormitoriesMatchSearch: No dormitories match your search criteria.
noHallsMatchSearch: No halls or sections match your search criteria.
pageNotFoundMessage: Sorry, the page you are looking for does not exist or has been moved.
updateYourProfileDetails: Update your profile and password here.
myDormitoryDescription: Check the status of your dormitory booking using your phone number.
pleaseEnterPhoneNumber: Please enter a phone number to search.
errorSearchingBookings: An error occurred while searching for your bookings. Please try again.
noBookingsFoundForPhone: No approved dormitory bookings found for this phone number.
selectDateRangeForReports: Select a date range to generate reports.
selectReportTypeAndDateRange: Select a report type. Data will be based on the chosen date range.
viewOrPrintDormitoryBookingData: View or print daily, weekly, or monthly dormitory booking data.
noDataForReport: No data available for the selected criteria.
selectDateRangeFirst: Please select a date range first.
yourBookingRequestHasBeenProcessed: Your booking request has been processed. Please check your dashboard or contact us for more details.
yourBookingsDescription: View and manage your facility bookings.
errorFetchingYourBookings: Error fetching your bookings. Please try again later.
mustBeLoggedInAsCompanyDashboard: You must be logged in as an approved company representative to view this page.
registrationPendingMessage: Your company registration is currently being reviewed by our admin team. You will be notified once it's approved. Thank you for your patience.
registrationRejectedMessage: We regret to inform you that your company registration has not been approved at this time. Please contact support if you believe this is an error.
statusUnknownMessage: We could not determine the current status of your account. Please contact support.
agreementConfirmedAndMockUploaded: Agreement confirmed and mock upload successful. (Actual file upload to be implemented)
errorMockUploadingAgreement: Error confirming signed agreement or during mock upload.
agreementNotAvailableForBooking: An agreement is not available or applicable for this type of booking or its current status.
enterCustomTermsHere: Enter any custom terms or modifications here. These will override default sections if specified, or be appended.
editTermsNote: Note: These terms will be part of the official agreement document. Review carefully.
agreementNotApplicable: Agreement is not applicable for this booking.
termsPlaceholder1: 1. Payment Terms: Full payment is due upon signing this agreement unless otherwise specified in writing. Late payments may incur a penalty of 1.5% per month.
termsPlaceholder2: 2. Cancellation Policy: Cancellations made less than 7 days prior to the event date will result in forfeiture of 50% of the total booking cost. Cancellations made less than 48 hours prior will result in forfeiture of the full amount.
termsPlaceholder3: 3. Use of Facility: The client agrees to use the facility only for the purpose stated in the booking. Any damage to the facility or equipment caused by the client or their attendees will be the responsibility of the client.
termsPlaceholder4: 4. Liability: The service provider is not responsible for any loss, theft, or damage to personal property of the client or attendees. The client agrees to indemnify and hold harmless the service provider from any claims arising out_of_the_client's use of the facility.
mustBeLoggedInAsCompanyToViewAgreement: You must be logged in as an authorized company representative to view this agreement.
accessDeniedViewAgreement: Access Denied: You are not authorized to view this agreement.
agreementNotReadyForViewing: This agreement is not yet ready for viewing or has already been completed.
invalidDateRange: End date cannot be before start date.
errorCheckingAvailability: Error checking availability. Please try again.
facilityNotAvailableOverride: {itemName} is not available for booking (admin override).
itemUnavailableConflict: {itemName} is not available for the selected dates due to a conflicting booking.
dormitoryCapacityNotConfigured: Dormitory capacity is not configured correctly.
dormitoryBedsUnavailable: All beds in {roomName} are booked for the selected period.
couldNotCalculatePrice: Could not calculate total price. Item price information is missing.
errorSavingBooking: There was an error saving your booking. Please try again.
errorSubmittingBooking: Error submitting booking. Please check details and try again.
duplicateBookingForPhoneOnDateError: Sorry, you cannot book twice with the same phone number for the same start date.
firestoreIndexRequiredErrorDetailed: A database configuration (Firestore index) is required to check for duplicate bookings. Please contact support or if you are an admin, check the browser console for a link to create the index.
errorCheckingExistingBookings: An error occurred while checking for existing bookings. Please try again.
firestorePermissionError: Database permission error. Cannot check existing bookings. Please contact support.
duplicateCheckSkippedBookingProceeds: Duplicate booking check was skipped due to a database configuration issue. Your booking will be submitted, but duplicates might occur. Admin will review. Please create the required Firestore index.
mustBeLoggedInAsCompanyToBookFacility: You must be logged in as an approved company representative to book facilities.
mustBeLoggedInAsCompany: You must be logged in as an approved company representative to perform this action.
itemNotAvailableError: {itemName} is currently not available for booking.
fillFormToBookSelectedSections: Fill out the form below to book the selected sections.
noSectionsSelected: No sections were selected for booking.
individualUserNote: Individual users (not representing a company) should contact us directly for dormitory bookings if online booking is not yet available for individuals.
phoneForTelegramIdentification: This phone number will be used for payment confirmation via Telegram.
phoneForTelegramIdentificationOptional: This phone number can be used for payment confirmation via Telegram (optional).
paymentReferenceNote: Please use your Booking ID ({bookingId}) as the payment reference/reason.
paymentReferenceNoteConfirmationPage: Remember to use your Booking ID ({bookingId}) as the payment reference.
telegramProofSubmissionInstruction: After making the payment, please send a screenshot of your transaction receipt to our Telegram bot @{botUsername} using your phone number: {phoneNumber} for verification.
afterSendingProofAdminWillVerify: After sending proof, an admin will verify your payment. You will be notified once confirmed.
completeYourPaymentDescription: Follow the instructions below to complete your payment via bank transfer.
missingBookingId: Booking ID is missing from the request.
paymentNotExpectedOrAlreadyProcessed: Payment is not currently expected for this booking or it has already been processed.
pageNoLongerInUseMessage: This page for submitting payment proof is no longer in use. Please follow the payment instructions provided via Telegram or on the payment details page.
paymentAwaitingTelegramVerificationDesc: Your payment proof has been submitted via Telegram and is awaiting verification by our team. You will be notified once confirmed.
userDataMissingError: Login successful, but key profile data is missing. Please contact support.
dormitoryNotAvailableAdminOverride: Dormitory Room {roomNumber} is currently set as unavailable by the administration and cannot be booked.
confirmDeleteBookingMessageFacility: Are you sure you want to delete this facility booking? This action cannot be undone and will permanently remove the booking record, including any associated agreement data.

adminPaymentReferenceNote: This information is for admin reference when verifying payments. It is not displayed to regular users during their booking process.
